item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - RITA ORA - Carry On, Ritual, You For Me (FLAC)
item.description:
Hi all,

I am checking if anyone have these three Rita Ora's track in lossless format (WAV/FLAC will do).
Thanks!

Kygo and Rita Ora - Carry On (from the 2019 film Pokemon Detective Pikachu)
Tiësto, Jonas Blue and Rita Ora - Ritual
Sigala and Rita Ora - You For Me
item.author: himxxhim
